data.description:
Metaenga — XR Training Platform that provides ready-to-use VR training with LMS and device management features for organizations and training centers, making workforce development more effective.

VR Training Library Modules: 
1 — HV Electrical Substation
2 — Occupational Safety and Health
3 — Motor Control Center Troubleshooting
4 — Transformer Oil Sampling
5 — Fire Safety and Emergency Response
6 — Feeder Protection Relay
7 — Heat Shrink Cable Joint
8 — Forklift Pre-use Inspection
9 — MV Substation Transformer Isolating
10 — Feeder Protection Relay
11 — Warehouse Training Experience

Metaenga offers an expanding library of VR training modules simulating real-world work scenarios and supports uploading custom 360-degree videos. 

Analytics and Reporting: 
Real-time performance tracking and reporting that provides valuable insights into employee development and measures the impact of training

Collaboration: 
The platform enables employees to collaborate in innovative virtual reality 360 video classrooms. 
VR classrooms feature synchronized 360-degree video viewing among trainees. An administrator uses a web interface to control the playback of these videos.

User-Friendly Interface: 
Metaenga provides a web interface for managing, deploying, and monitoring VR training content.

Metaenga—XR Training Platform operates on a subscription basis per headset license, allowing scalability according to an organization's size. 

To learn more, visit https://metaenga.com

changelog.change_log:
New Statistic module (all trainings’ve changed also)
Flex plan logic
Changes in Standard plan
Trainings download process are now faster

[UI]:

- "Cancel" button in "Sign up" and "Log in" windows returns user to previous page.
- minor changes in design

[Misc]:

- added info about Feeder training
- logined user won't be suggested to sign up when pressed "Access with Standart Plan" button 
- added various errors display

[UI]:

- added details page for trainings and videos
- added time and battery info in main menu
- added battery charging status
- added color battery level in settings
- added logic of notifying user email when needed
- training labels are more colourful 
- Back To Top button is now not above other content

[Misc]:

- added various images
- added various styles
- added various button hovers
- page refreshes after user leaves it

[Bug fixes]:

- fixed issue with incorrect free space display
- fixed issue with checker email
- fixed issue with training duplicate when bought a subscription
- other minor fixes with design
Fixed issue with invalid email addresses
